participant_1.background:
I met my family at a local hiking group.
i have a career in party planning.
i am a graduate student.
i am usually very shy.
i run track.

participant_2.background:
My home is wherever I'm sharing my wit.
I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
I've broken many things because of my clumsiness.
I love to watch the deer on my vacation to Lake Michigan.

content.text: I'm running track in the local 5k tomorrow
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great
Thanks! I'm excited but also nervous
I understand, but you know what they say...
I've heard that before, but I don't really believe it
It's true! When you're nervous, it's because you care about something. So if you're nervous, that means you're ready to put your best foot forward
I guess you're right. I'm going to do my best
That's all you can ask for! I'm sure you'll do great
Thanks for the encouragement! I feel better about it no
